languages.text: "Слава Лорд-капитану, сегодня вы покорили могучего зверя. На этом будем считать знакомство оконченным — у вас наверняка есть срочные дела, а мне пора прогнать Дикаря по магистрали и посмотреть, как он будет капризничать сегодня".

"All hail the Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. Now, I'm sure you have urgent business to attend to, and it's time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."
languages.original_text: "Слава Лорд-капитану, сегодня вы покорили могучего зверя. На этом будем считать знакомство оконченным — у вас наверняка есть срочные дела, а мне пора прогнать Дикаря по магистрали и посмотреть, как он будет капризничать сегодня".

traits.locale_text: "Hail Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. You must have urgent business to attend to, and it is time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."
"Hail Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. You must have urgent business to attend to, and it is time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."

"All hail the Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. Now, I'm sure you have urgent business to attend to, and it's time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."

"All hail the Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. Now, I'm sure you have urgent business to attend to, and it's time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."

"All hail the Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. Now, I'm sure you have urgent business to attend to, and it's time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."

languages.text: «¡Viva {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán! Hoy ha dominado a una poderosa bestia. Bueno, seguro que tiene cosas importantes que hacer, de modo que yo voy a llevar a Salvaje a la línea de carga y a comprobar si está molesto».
languages.original_text: "All hail the Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. Now, I'm sure you have urgent business to attend to, and it's time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."

traits.locale_text: «¡Viva {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán! Hoy ha dominado a una poderosa bestia. Bueno, seguro que tiene cosas importantes que hacer, de modo que yo voy a llevar a Salvaje a la línea de carga y a comprobar si está molesto».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン万歳！あなたは今日、強大な獣を制圧しました。さて、あなたにはきっと急用があるでしょう。サベージが不機嫌になったかどうか運転して確認する時間です」
languages.original_text: "All hail the Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. Now, I'm sure you have urgent business to attend to, and it's time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン万歳！あなたは今日、強大な獣を制圧しました。さて、あなたにはきっと急用があるでしょう。サベージが不機嫌になったかどうか運転して確認する時間です」

languages.text: “向舰长大人致意！您今天驯服了一头猛兽。至于现在，我相信您还有紧急的事情要处理。我也准备驾驶萨维奇，沿着货运航线继续前进，看看它是不是哪里不太舒服。”
languages.original_text: "All hail the Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. Now, I'm sure you have urgent business to attend to, and it's time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."

traits.locale_text: “向舰长大人致意！您今天驯服了一头猛兽。至于现在，我相信您还有紧急的事情要处理。我也准备驾驶萨维奇，沿着货运航线继续前进，看看它是不是哪里不太舒服。”

languages.text: "Es lebe der Lord Captain! Ihr habt heute eine mächtige Bestie niedergerungen. Ich bin sicher, auf Euch warten dringende Aufgaben, und ich muss mich um Wild kümmern und nachsehen, wie reizbar er ist."
languages.original_text: "All hail the Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. Now, I'm sure you have urgent business to attend to, and it's time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."

traits.locale_text: "Es lebe der Lord Captain! Ihr habt heute eine mächtige Bestie niedergerungen. Ich bin sicher, auf Euch warten dringende Aufgaben, und ich muss mich um Wild kümmern und nachsehen, wie reizbar er ist."

languages.text: « Gloire {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} ! Vous avez dompté une bête redoutable. Sur ce, je gage que le devoir vous appelle, et il est temps pour moi d'aller faire un tour avec Sauvage pour voir dans quel état d'esprit il se trouve aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "All hail the Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. Now, I'm sure you have urgent business to attend to, and it's time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."

traits.locale_text: « Gloire {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} ! Vous avez dompté une bête redoutable. Sur ce, je gage que le devoir vous appelle, et il est temps pour moi d'aller faire un tour avec Sauvage pour voir dans quel état d'esprit il se trouve aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'a selam olsun! Bugün kudretli bir canavara boyun eğdirdiniz. Artık ilgilenmeniz gereken acil yükümlülükleriniz olduğundan eminim. Benim de Hoyrat'ı yük hattına götürme vaktim geldi. Huysuzluğu üzerinde miymiş diye bir bakayım."
languages.original_text: "All hail the Lord Captain! You have subdued a mighty beast today. Now, I'm sure you have urgent business to attend to, and it's time for me to drive Savage down the line and see if he is feeling cranky."
